topic.title: zeronet现在这么少人，我有一计可以让这里火起来。The problem is who can do that
topic.body: 谁能黑一个人气高点的网站，把zeronet的信息挂上去，不久这里人气肯定多起来。（Who can hack web sites and put zeronet's imformation on it ,then more people will come here.Chinese websites are the best to hack）顺便分享一下本账号，谁要谁拿去用，复制建个文本，保存为users.json（share the ID for everyone who need it）：https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmPCNC3WiKgdqEe8fyPkKjzY5cRfK4uXEV3YFht9RFAgYp
